PSCT.Base: If this card you control would be used as Synchro Material, you can treat it as a non-Tuner. You can only use each of the following effects of "Centur-Ion Atrii" once per turn. If this card is Normal or Special Summoned, and you have both an "Emblema" card and a "Centur-Ion" card in your GY: You can draw 1 card, also you cannot Special Summon "Centur-Ion Atrii" for the rest of this turn. During the Main Phase, if this card is a Continuous Trap: You can Special Summon this card.
